template.heading: Survey Successfully Finished
template.message:
Awesome! Your responses have been submitted.
Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

issue.heading: Quality Issue
issue.message: For security reasons, we are unable to process your response. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

screenout.heading: Screened Out
screenout.message: Looks like this one wasn’t the right fit for you, but we appreciate your time! Stay tuned for more opportunities.

reached.heading: Target Reached
reached.message: Oops! This survey filled up quickly. But dont worry—more surveys are coming your way soon!
